Retards..... This isn't a virus, your anti-virus program says it's a virus because it injects a .dll into the game. if it doesn't work, you have to select the file in your anti-virus program and set it as an "exception" otherwise your program will block the injection and wont work

@nathanjuuh and everyone else.

Okay I can tell you right now you dickless fuck that this is definitely a virus. If I didn't have Kaspersky my computer would be totally fucked. It swaps around your mouse buttons, fucks with your .exe association, disables task manager and creates a load of folders everywhere. I've just about got it locked down and fixed but DO NOT BE TEMPTED TO DOWNLOAD THIS, DESPITE WHAT ANYONE SAYS.

Please guys, do not download this whatever you do.
I was the stupid one who didn't bother to read the comments and run this without any anti-virus program. If you're also infected here's what I did for a simple fix. Download this http://www.dougknox.com/xp/fileassoc/xp_exe_fix.zip and put it on a usb stick. When booting up repetitively press F8, then choose 'Repair'. Open command prompt and type e: (or whatever the usb drive letter is) then regedit xp_exe_fix.reg. Restart PC.
Always read comments when downloading torrents and make sure you have up-to-date Anti-Virus software.

Type this: attrib -a -h -r -s c:\windows\system32
